# Amit Divekar - Full-Stack Software Engineer Portfolio
> A professional portfolio showcasing Full-Stack Software Engineering expertise in Cloud Architecture, DevOps, AI solutions, and modern web development.

## About
- [Home](https://amitdevx.tech): Professional introduction and hero section.
- [About Me](https://amitdevx.tech/#about): Background, education (CGPA 8.36/10), and personal expertise overview.
- [Resume/CV](https://amitdevx.tech/cv): Complete professional credentials and qualifications.

## Professional Content
- [Experience](https://amitdevx.tech/#experience): Professional journey including Virtual Experience at Electronic Arts (EA).
- [Projects](https://amitdevx.tech/#projects): Portfolio projects demonstrating Full-Stack capabilities with React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Cloud technologies.
- [Skills & Expertise](https://amitdevx.tech/#skills): Comprehensive technology stack including AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, React, Next.js, Python, Node.js, and AI/ML.
- [Certifications](https://amitdevx.tech/#certifications): Professional certifications and achievements in software engineering.

## Technical Content
- [Technical Blog](https://amitdevx.tech/blogs): Articles on software engineering, DevOps, and cloud architecture.
- [Reddit API in JSON](https://amitdevx.tech/blogs/reddit-api-json): Deep dive into API integration and data structures.
- [Professor Profiler](https://amitdevx.tech/blogs/professor-profiler): Software engineering patterns and best practices.

## Key Expertise Areas
- **Cloud Platforms**: AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Microsoft Azure
- **DevOps & Infrastructure**: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, GitHub Actions
- **Frontend Development**: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui
- **Backend Development**: Node.js, Express.js, Python, RESTful APIs
- **Databases**: SQL, NoSQL, Data Structures
- **AI & Machine Learning**: AI-driven solutions, ML applications
